unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyya, is a must these days! My khet in Punjab got hit hard on 20/07/2023. Lost almost Rs. 50000 worth of moong. Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helps, right? Filed a claim via SBI on 22/07/2023 at 11:00 hrs. Still waiting... hope the sarkari babus process it before Diwali! What's the scene in your area, Sharmaji? Heard Andhra is better with payouts by 15/08/2023. Jai Kisan!
normalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyya, is a must these days! My khet in Punjab got hit hard on twentieth july two thousand and twenty three. Lost almost rupee fifty thousand worth of moong. Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helps, right? Filed a claim via S B I on twenty second july two thousand and twenty three at eleven zero zero hours. Still waiting... hope the sarkari babus process it before Diwali! What's the scene in your area, Sharmaji? Heard Andhra is better with payouts by fifteenth august two thousand and twenty three. Jai Kisan!
